summary:
A close friend of mine recently landed a new job and is now considering quitting. 
It's impossible to predict whether you'll enjoy a workplace, but it usually becomes apparent soon after starting.  If you consistently feel like "this is the wrong place for me," I strongly believe you should quit as soon as possible...
title: Quit or Stay?

summary:
Today is August 17th, so we’re over halfway through Blaugust 2024 and I thought I would just let you know how it’s going.  Bonus, it counts for my blog post for today. 
After a few months of mostly not blogging, having a goal to post something every day was a real jump...
title: Mid-Blaugust 2024 Check-In
